meta.title: THE WAY by TW | Custom Bot & Web Development Solutions
meta.description: I design and develop smart, scalable, and high-performance solutions including Telegram bots, responsive websites, and secure hosting to help your business grow.
meta.keywords: Telegram Bot Development, Web Development, Hosting Solutions, Source Code Sales, custom bots, responsive websites, THE WAY by TW

about_page.title: About Me & My Skills
about_page.description: With over 5 years of experience, I specialize in building custom Telegram bots tailored to your unique needs. From simple notification bots to complex integrated systems with payment gateways and external APIs, I deliver robust and scalable solutions.

meta.title: About Me | Experienced Telegram Bot Developer
meta.description: With 5+ years of experience, I build high-performance Telegram bots using Python (aiogram) and Node.js (Telegraf). Discover my skills in API integration, database design, and bot deployment.
meta.keywords: telegram bot expert, aiogram developer, telegraf.js expert, python bot developer, node.js bot developer, bot developer skills, developer portfolio

meta.title: Telegram Bot Development Services | Custom Builds, Hosting & Rentals
meta.description: Full-range Telegram bot services: custom bot development from scratch, reliable bot hosting, and affordable bot rentals. Let's build a solution to automate and grow your business.
meta.keywords: telegram bot services, custom bot development, telegram bot hosting, rent telegram bot, e-commerce bot, subscription bot, telegram automation solutions

meta.title: My Work | Telegram Bot Development Portfolio
meta.description: Explore my portfolio of custom Telegram bots, featuring advanced e-commerce solutions, automated support systems, and content subscription bots. See my development expertise in action.
meta.keywords: telegram bot portfolio, bot development examples, e-commerce telegram bot, customer support bot, subscription bot project, bot developer work, botdev pro projects

contact_page.title: Get In Touch
contact_page.description: Have a project in mind? I'd love to hear about it. Fill out the form below or reach out via my social channels and let's create something amazing.

form.success_message: Thank you! Your default email client should now be open for you to send your message.

meta.title: Contact | Hire a Freelance Telegram Bot Developer
meta.description: Ready to start your Telegram bot project? Contact me for a free consultation and quote. I'm available for new freelance projects and collaborations.
meta.keywords: contact telegram developer, hire telegram bot developer, freelance bot developer, bot project quote, telegram bot consultation, get in touch
